movies.title: The One That Got Away
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Oberleutnant Franz von Werra, the only german prisoner of war captured in Britain to escape back to Germany during the Second World War.

movies.title: Abandon Ship
movies.plot: Ship's officer finds himself in command of a lifeboat full of survivors of a sunken luxury liner.

events.title: the William Brown hits an iceberg and sinks

movies.title: The Spirit of St. Louis
movies.plot: Charles 'Slim' Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will make his New York to Paris flight the first solo transatlantic crossing.

events.title: Charles Lindbergh lifts off from Long Island

movies.title: Saint Joan
movies.plot: Young Joan of Arc comes to the palace in France to make The Dauphin King of France and is appointed to head the French Army. After winning many battles she is not needed any longer and soon she is thought of as a witch.

events.title: Joan of Arc is burned at the stake
Joan of Arc attends the coronation of Charles VII
